TEXT: The applicant , Mr ORG , is a NORP citizen of NORP origin , who was born in DATE and lives in PERSON . GPE . He is represented before the ORG by Mr PERSON , a lawyer practicing in GPE , GPE .
The facts of the case , as submitted by the applicant , may be summarised as follows .

The applicant owned a house where he lived with his family and adjacent stable and wooden house in the village GPE , GPE . On DATE the applicant , due to a military action by ORG , left GPE and went to live in GPE .
The applicant alleges that after his departure his property in GPE was devastated sometime between CARDINAL DATE and DATE by the members of ORG .
The applicant alleges further that the NORP authorities impeded his return to GPE . He was able to obtain NORP identity documents only in DATE and to enter GPE only in DATE .
In the meantime ORG introduced CARDINAL changes to the law governing compensation for damage caused by terrorist acts and the war - related damage .

Firstly , on DATE the NORP parliament introduced a change of LAW which provided that all proceedings concerning actions for damages resulting from terrorist acts were to be stayed pending the enactment of new legislation on the subject and that before the enactment of such new legislation damages for terrorist acts may not be sought . So far the NORP authorities have not enacted any new legislation regulating the matter .

Secondly , on DATE ORG introduced a change of LAW which provided that all proceedings concerning actions for damages resulting from acts of members of the NORP army or police when acting in their official capacity during the war in GPE were to be stayed .
The relevant part of LAW ( Zakon o obveznim odnosima ) reads as follows :

“ Responsibility for damages caused by death , bodily injury or by abstraction or destruction of another person ’s property , when it results from violent acts or terror or from public demonstrations or manifestations , lies with the authority whose officials were , according to the laws in effect , under a duty to prevent such damages . ”
The relevant parts of the LAW on Changes of LAW read ( Zakon o izmjenama i dopunama PERSON o obveznim odnosima - Official Gazette no . CARDINAL/CARDINAL ) as follows :
“ Section CARDINAL of LAW ( the Official Gazette nos . CARDINAL , CARDINAL and DATE ) is to be repealed . ”
“ Proceedings for damages instituted pursuant to LAW are to be stayed .
Proceedings referred to in LAW of this section will be continued after enactment of a special legislation that will regulate responsibility for damages resulting from the terrorist acts . ”

Section CARDINAL ( a ) of the Act on Changes of LAW ( Zakon o dopunama GPE o obveznim odnosima , ORG no . CARDINAL ) provides that all proceedings instituted against GPE for damages caused by members of the NORP army or police when acting in their official capacity during the Homeland War in GPE from DATE to DATE are to be stayed .
